§ Helen Elizabeth Krempeaux

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

**Helen Elizabeth Krempeaux** is the name **Helen Elizabeth Kerr** (my paternal grandmother) took when she got married **Charles Stanislaus Krempeaux**.
As per the customs in Canada, when women marry, they usually take on their husbands family-name — which in this case is **Krempeaux**.

For more information on my father's mother see: **Helen Elizabeth Kerr**
